languages.text: "Конечно. Господин ван Калокс выполнял мое задание, а также, после смерти Теодоры, приглядывал за вами от лица моей организации. Прискорбно, что теперь он не может сказать ни одного доброго слова про вашу персону". {n}Сожаление в голосе инквизитора почему-то звучит как угроза.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Да. Господин ван Калокс выполнял мое задание, а также мог бы представить вас Инквизиции. Прискорбно, что теперь он не может сказать ни одного доброго слова про вашу персону".

languages.text: "Indeed he was. Master van Calox was performing a task he had received from me, and, after Theodora's death, he was watching over you on behalf of my organisation. It is unfortunate that he can no longer say a single word in your favour." {n}The regret in his voice sounds oddly like a threat.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Конечно. Господин ван Калокс выполнял мое задание, а также, после смерти Теодоры, приглядывал за вами от лица моей организации. Прискорбно, что теперь он не может сказать ни одного доброго слова про вашу персону". {n}Сожаление в голосе инквизитора почему-то звучит как угроза.{/n}

It is unfortunate that he can no longer say a single word in your favour." {n}The regret in his voice sounds oddly like a threat.{/n}

"Indeed he was. Master van Calox was performing a task he had received from me, and, after Theodora's death, he was watching over you on behalf of my organisation. It is unfortunate that he can no longer say a single word in your favour." {n}The regret in his voice sounds oddly like a threat.{/n}

languages.text: 「そのとおり。マスター・ヴァン・カロックスは私が託した任務を実行し、シオドーラの死後は我が組織に代わってお前を監視していた。残念ながらお前に好意的な言葉を一言も持っていない」{n}残念という声には脅すような奇妙な響きがある。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed he was. Master van Calox was performing a task he had received from me, and, after Theodora's death, he was watching over you on behalf of my organisation. It is unfortunate that he can no longer say a single word in your favour." {n}The regret in his voice sounds oddly like a threat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そのとおり。マスター・ヴァン・カロックスは私が託した任務を実行し、シオドーラの死後は我が組織に代わってお前を監視していた。残念ながらお前に好意的な言葉を一言も持っていない」{n}残念という声には脅すような奇妙な響きがある。{/n}

languages.original_text: "Indeed he was. Master van Calox was performing a task he had received from me, and, after Theodora's death, he was watching over you on behalf of my organisation. It is unfortunate that he can no longer say a single word in your favour." {n}The regret in his voice sounds oddly like a threat.{/n}

languages.text: “正是如此，冯·卡洛克斯大师当时正在执行我给他的任务。西奥多拉死后，也是由他代表审判庭继续监视你。真是遗憾，他没办法再替你美言了。”{n}不知为何，他语气中的遗憾之意听起来更像是威胁。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed he was. Master van Calox was performing a task he had received from me, and, after Theodora's death, he was watching over you on behalf of my organisation. It is unfortunate that he can no longer say a single word in your favour." {n}The regret in his voice sounds oddly like a threat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “正是如此，冯·卡洛克斯大师当时正在执行我给他的任务。西奥多拉死后，也是由他代表审判庭继续监视你。真是遗憾，他没办法再替你美言了。”{n}不知为何，他语气中的遗憾之意听起来更像是威胁。{/n}

languages.text: «Efectivamente. El maestro van Calox estaba cumpliendo una tarea que le había encomendado y, tras la muerte de Theodora, velaba por usted en nombre de mi organización. Lamentablemente, ya no puede hablar en su favor». {n}El pesar de su voz es extrañamente amenazador.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed he was. Master van Calox was performing a task he had received from me, and, after Theodora's death, he was watching over you on behalf of my organisation. It is unfortunate that he can no longer say a single word in your favour." {n}The regret in his voice sounds oddly like a threat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Efectivamente. El maestro van Calox estaba cumpliendo una tarea que le había encomendado y, tras la muerte de Theodora, velaba por usted en nombre de mi organización. Lamentablemente, ya no puede hablar en su favor». {n}El pesar de su voz es extrañamente amenazador.{/n}

languages.text: « C'est exact. Maître van Calox était en mission pour moi et, après la mort de Théodora, je l'ai chargé de vous garder à l'œil au nom de mon organisation. Quel dommage qu'il ne puisse plus intercéder en votre faveur. » {n}Un regret qui vous parvient comme une menace.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed he was. Master van Calox was performing a task he had received from me, and, after Theodora's death, he was watching over you on behalf of my organisation. It is unfortunate that he can no longer say a single word in your favour." {n}The regret in his voice sounds oddly like a threat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est exact. Maître van Calox était en mission pour moi et, après la mort de Théodora, je l'ai chargé de vous garder à l'œil au nom de mon organisation. Quel dommage qu'il ne puisse plus intercéder en votre faveur. » {n}Un regret qui vous parvient comme une menace.{/n}

languages.text: "In der Tat. Meister van Calox hat für mich eine Aufgabe erledigt, und nach Theodoras Tod wachte er im Namen meiner Organisation über Euch. Es ist unschön, dass er kein einziges positives Wort mehr über Euch sagen kann." {n}Das Bedauern in seiner Stimme klingt unangenehm nach einer Drohung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed he was. Master van Calox was performing a task he had received from me, and, after Theodora's death, he was watching over you on behalf of my organisation. It is unfortunate that he can no longer say a single word in your favour." {n}The regret in his voice sounds oddly like a threat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat. Meister van Calox hat für mich eine Aufgabe erledigt, und nach Theodoras Tod wachte er im Namen meiner Organisation über Euch. Es ist unschön, dass er kein einziges positives Wort mehr über Euch sagen kann." {n}Das Bedauern in seiner Stimme klingt unangenehm nach einer Drohung.{/n}

languages.text: "Elbette. Üstat van Calox, benden aldığı görevi yerine getirmekte ve Theodora'nın ölümünün ardından organizasyonum adına seni gözlemlemekteydi. Yararına herhangi bir şey söyleyebilecek durumda olmaması çok yazık." {n}Sesindeki üzüntü, tuhaf derecede tehdidi andırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed he was. Master van Calox was performing a task he had received from me, and, after Theodora's death, he was watching over you on behalf of my organisation. It is unfortunate that he can no longer say a single word in your favour." {n}The regret in his voice sounds oddly like a threat.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Elbette. Üstat van Calox benden aldığı görevi yerine getirmekteydi ve Theodora'nın ölümünün ardından organizasyonum adına seni gözlemlemekteydi. Yararına herhangi bir şey söyleyebilecek durumda olmaması çok yazık." {n}Sesindeki üzüntü tuhaf derecede tehdidi andırıyor.{/n}
